AboutUsPage.Section1Text: Our parent company, Dem Fırat Karven Tekstil, was established in 1991 in Istanbul by Cuma Ozturk. Cuma was the eldest child in a family with 21 kids. He grew up near the Iranian border on the rural side of Turkey. Because of the lack of resources during his childhood, he dropped out of school at the age of nine and started working at local shops.
AboutUsPage.Section2Text1: Cuma's parents' negligence and being the eldest among his siblings left him with an immense responsibility to work hard and provide for his family. So to make money fast, he started crossing the Iranian border as a kid to buy goods at a cheaper rate, then brought and traded them in Turkey.
AboutUsPage.Section2Text2: Yet, after getting caught numerously and punished by the authorities, he knew he needed to find a long-term, less risky alternative. So at 13, he moved to the West of Turkey all by himself for better job opportunities. After a decade of hard, laborious work at construction sites, restaurants, and retail shops on the West side of the country, in 1991, at the age of 23, he opened his first textile shop in Laleli, Istanbul, with a business partner. However, in 1997, when his first child was born (that's me!), the partners had disagreements, leading them to separate ways.
AboutUsPage.Section3Text: Although his former partners tried to discourage and force him out of business, this only powered him to open his own textile store. His genuine attitude and fine quality of his products made his shop recognized. With the growing demand, he started bringing his siblings left on the East side of the country and employing them one after the other.
AboutUsPage.Section4Text: Cuma and his siblings opened their first abroad warehouse in Moscow and started supplying Turkish textiles to the Russian market, later expanding to Ukraine, Belarus, and Kazakhstan.
AboutUsPage.Section5Text: Soon Cuma's manufacturing partners could not meet his growing market demand. So, he acquired 60,000 SF of empty land and built his first textile mill just an hour from Istanbul to fully supervise the production and cut unnecessary costs bearing his clients.
AboutUsPage.Section6Text1: Having started a successful company and being able take care of his siblings by employing them has made Cuma's dreams come true.
AboutUsPage.Section6Text2: Dem Fırat Karven started as a small family-run textile shop in Istanbul in 1991. Today we grew into a manufacturing plant that produces over 20 million yards of fabric every month and supplies all around the globe with its strong supply chain network.
AboutUsPage.Section6Text3: The growth has been an exciting and ever-changing journey. However, our core values have always stayed the same. Our growing family is what encourages us to continue providing high-quality products and exceptional customer service.

HomeReviews.review_1_text: Very nice curtains with great quality. Shipping issues were resolved quickly, customer service was always available and responded very quickly! Thanks! Always my pleasure!
HomeReviews.review_3_text: Love them! Exactly as pictured; so elegant looking! I'll happily order from this shop again.
HomeReviews.review_4_text: So pretty, and it arrived really fast!
HomeReviews.review_5_text: Wonderful quality. Friendly salesman, always available. Responds to messages in a timely manner. Again and again!
HomeReviews.review_6_text: My first order came with a request to know if I was pleased with my purchase. Instead of answering the question I reordered my first purchase. I believe that's speaks more loudly. If I had more windows that needed sheers I would buy these all o we again and again. I have never seen any as beautiful!!! Even my adult sons who don't notice said 'Wow!' Those are beautiful Mom. Thank you thank you!
HomeReviews.review_7_text: I love my curtains but I love the customer service even better they went beyond to make sure I received my beautiful curtains

KVKK.disclaimer: Note: This policy may be updated periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. Please review it regularly.

section1.text: At Karven Homedecor, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This General Data Protection Policy outlines how we collect, use, store, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or make a purchase, ensuring transparency and trust for our international customers.
section1.title: 1. Introduction

section10.text: If you have any questions about this policy or your personal data, please contact us:
section10.title: 10. Contact Us

items.1: Contact Information: Email address, phone number, shipping and billing address
items.2: Transaction Information: Order history, product preferences, cart contents
items.3: Technical Information: IP address, device information, cookies
items.4: Payment Information: Encrypted payment details (processed securely by third-party providers)
items.5: [TRANSLATE] Görsel/İşitsel Kayıtlar: Müşteri hizmetleri görüşme kayıtları (onay alınarak)

section2.text: We collect the following types of personal information to provide you with our services:
section2.title: 2. Data We Collect

items.2: Providing customer support and resolving inquiries
items.3: Improving our website and user experience
items.5: Marketing communications (only with your explicit consent)
items.7: [TRANSLATE] Hukuki uyuşmazlıkların çözümü ve hukuki taleplere cevap verilmesi

section3.text: Your personal data is used for the following purposes:
section3.title: 3. How We Use Your Data

items.0: Shipping Companies: To deliver your orders
items.1: Payment Processors: To securely process transactions (e.g., iyzico)
items.2: Service Providers: For website hosting and maintenance
items.3: Legal Authorities: If required by law
items.4: [TRANSLATE] Hukuk Müşavirleri: Hukuki işlemlerin yürütülmesi için
items.5: [TRANSLATE] Bulut Hizmet Sağlayıcıları: Veri depolama ve sistem altyapısı için

section4.note: We do not sell your personal data to third parties.
section4.text: We may share your data with trusted third parties solely for operational purposes:
section4.title: 4. Data Sharing

items.0: SSL encryption for secure data transmission
items.4: [TRANSLATE] Log Kayıtları: Bilgi güvenliği için 2 yıl

section5.text: We implement robust security measures to protect your data:
section5.title: 5. Data Security

items.0: Access the personal data we hold about you
items.2: Request deletion of your data (subject to legal retention requirements)
items.4: Object to data processing in certain circumstances
items.5: [TRANSLATE] KVKK'nın 7. maddesinde öngörülen şartlar çerçevesinde kişisel verilerinizin silinmesini veya yok edilmesini isteme,
items.6: [TRANSLATE] Düzeltme, silme veya yok edilme işlemlerinin kişisel verilerin aktarıldığı üçüncü kişilere bildirilmesini isteme,
items.7: [TRANSLATE] İşlenen verilerin münhasıran otomatik sistemler vasıtasıyla analiz edilmesi suretiyle aleyhinize bir sonucun ortaya çıkmasına itiraz etme,
items.8: [TRANSLATE] Kişisel verilerin kanuna aykırı olarak işlenmesi sebebiyle zarara uğramanız hâlinde zararın giderilmesini talep etme.

section6.text: We respect your rights regarding your personal data. You have the right to:
section6.title: 6. Your Rights

methods.1: [TRANSLATE] Posta: Kemalpaşa Mah Gençtürk Cad No 21A     Fatih, İstanbul 34134,  Türkiye
methods.2: [TRANSLATE] Islak İmzalı Dilekçe: Yukarıdaki adrese şahsen teslim

section7.note: [TRANSLATE] Başvurularınız, talebin niteliğine göre en geç 30 gün içinde ücretsiz olarak sonuçlandırılacaktır. İşlemin ayrıca bir maliyeti gerektirmesi hâlinde, KVKK'da belirtilen tarifedeki ücret talep edilebilir.
section7.text: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience. These include essential cookies for site functionality and optional analytics cookies to understand how you use our site. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.
section7.title: 7. Cookies

items.0: [TRANSLATE] Teknik Çerezler: Sitenin çalışması için gerekli, oturum yönetimi
items.1: [TRANSLATE] Analitik Çerezler: Site kullanımının analiz edilmesi (Google Analytics vb.)
items.2: [TRANSLATE] Pazarlama Çerezleri: Kişiselleştirilmiş reklamlar için (onay alınarak)

section8.note: [TRANSLATE] Tarayıcı ayarlarınızdan çerezleri yönetebilir veya engelleyebilirsiniz. Ancak teknik çerezlerin engellenmesi, sitenin doğru çalışmamasına neden olabilir.
section8.text: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, including for the purposes of satisfying any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.
section8.title: 8. Retention Period

items.0: [TRANSLATE] SSL (Secure Socket Layer) güvenlik sertifikası ile şifreli veri iletimi
items.1: [TRANSLATE] Ödeme bilgilerinin PCI-DSS standartlarına uygun şekilde işlenmesi
items.3: [TRANSLATE] Yetkisiz erişime karşı güçlü şifreleme yöntemleri
items.4: [TRANSLATE] Erişim yetkilendirme ve log kayıt sistemleri
items.5: [TRANSLATE] Düzenli güvenlik denetimleri ve penetrasyon testleri

section9.text: As we operate globally, your data may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure that appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data during such transfers.
section9.title: 9. International Transfers

ReturnPolicy.summary:
For your purchases via Demfirat.com, you can exercise your right of withdrawal within 14 days from the date of delivery without giving any reason. It is sufficient to convey your withdrawal request via e-mail, telephone, or written notification. After the notification, the product must be sent to us within 10 days, unused and undamaged. If the product is faulty or defective, the return shipping fee is covered by us; for returns within the scope of the right of withdrawal, the shipping fee belongs to the customer. The amount you paid will be refunded according to your payment method within 14 days at the latest after the product is received by us.

For products produced with personalized measurements, returns are not accepted unless the product is faulty. In the case of a defective product, your rights to repair, replacement, discount, or refund are reserved. For detailed information, you can review our relevant return and withdrawal rights page.

delivery.text: All our products are delivered to the courier within 1-3 business days after order confirmation.
delivery.title: Delivery Information

ReturnPolicy.disclaimer: Consumer Arbitration Committees and Consumer Courts: In case of disputes arising from this contract, you can apply to the Consumer Arbitration Committee or Consumer Court in your place of residence or where the transaction took place, within the monetary limits announced annually by the Ministry of Trade.

section1.text: This page explains the withdrawal rights and return conditions for consumers shopping on the Karven Homedecor e-commerce site. Our return policy is designed to ensure customer satisfaction while complying with relevant consumer protection regulations.
section1.title: 1. General Information

contactBox: Address: Kemalpasa Mah Gencturk Cad No 21A, Fatih, Istanbul 34134, Turkey
section10.text: For returns, withdrawal rights, or any questions:
section10.title: 10. Contact

items: The withdrawal period starts from the day you or a third party indicated by you receives the product.
If the last day falls on a public holiday, the period extends to the end of the next business day.
As a seller, we may extend this period at our own initiative.
For multiple product orders, a separate withdrawal period starts for each product.
section2.text: You have the right to withdraw from the contract within 14 days of receiving your product, without giving any reason and without paying any penalty.
section2.title: 2. Withdrawal Period

methods: Email: Send your withdrawal notification to info@demfirat.com
Written Notice: Fill out the withdrawal form and send it to our address
section3.note: Important: It is sufficient to notify us that you wish to withdraw. You do not need to state a reason.
section3.text: To exercise your right of withdrawal, you can choose one of the following methods:
section3.title: 3. How to Exercise Your Right of Withdrawal

packagingItems: Place the product in its original box.
Use additional protective material to prevent damage.
Send via insured shipping if possible.
steps: You must send the product back to us within 10 days.
The product must be unused, undamaged, and in its original packaging.
All accessories and documents that came with the product must be included.
The invoice or delivery note must be sent with the product.
section4.text: After sending us your withdrawal notification:
section4.title: 4. Returning the Product

addressLines: Dem Fırat Karven Tekstil San. ve Tic. A.Ş.
infoItems: If the product is defective or incorrect: We cover the shipping cost.
If exercising the right of withdrawal only: The customer is responsible for return shipping costs.
For promotional products: Unless we covered the initial shipping, the customer pays for return shipping.
section5.title: 5. Shipping Fees

methodItems: Credit Card: The refund appears on your card within 2-10 business days (depending on the bank).
Bank Transfer (EFT): Within 1-3 business days if you provide your account details.
Cash on Delivery: Refunded via EFT to your bank account.
section6.note: Important: Refunds will not be issued before we receive the product. However, the process starts once your application is accepted, even before the product arrives.
processSteps: Withdrawal Notification: You inform us of your request.
Product Return: You ship the product within 10 days.
Product Inspection: The product is inspected in our warehouse (1-2 business days).
Refund: Your refund is processed according to your payment method.
section6.text: We will refund the full amount you paid within 14 days of receiving your withdrawal notification.
section6.title: 6. Refunds

section7.text: Custom tailored products (curtains made to your specific measurements) cannot be returned if the product is not defective.
section7.title: 7. Custom Tailored Products
section7.warning: Important: Please carefully check your measurements before placing your order to avoid measurement errors.

section8.info: In case of a defective product, you can choose one of the above and notify us. As the seller, we are obliged to fulfill your chosen request.
items: Request free repair of the product.
Request replacement with a non-defective equivalent.
Request a price reduction in proportion to the defect.
Withdraw from the contract and request a refund.
section8.text: If you detect a defect (fault, error) in your product, you can use your rights regarding defective goods instead of the right of withdrawal:
section8.title: 8. Defective Products - Warranty Rights

section9.note: Direct exchanges may be possible depending on stock status. Please contact our customer service to evaluate your situation.
section9.text: If you only want to exchange a product (different size, color, etc.), please first return the current product using your right of withdrawal, then create a new order.
section9.title: 9. Exchanges

ReturnPolicy.title: Delivery & Return Policy
